name: Spaced Together
description:
The game was made for GMTK GameJam 2021.

It's one-button game. Use ►SPACEBAR◄ to change gravity direction and try to achieve best score.  Dodge asteroids and stars and let the planets evolve. However, remember that the sudden appearance of a black hole can change everything.

Catch the rhythm and have fun!

What does the gravity allow itself? 

CREDITS
